changeSet.sql:
update global_property set property_value = "SELECT DISTINCT result.Identifier AS 'Patient ID', result.provider AS 'Providers', result.Service AS 'Team', result.Service_Type AS 'Service Appointment Types', Concat('',p.uuid) AS uuid FROM visit v JOIN person_name pn ON v.patient_id = pn.person_id AND pn.voided = 0 JOIN person p ON p.person_id = v.patient_id INNER JOIN ( select pa.patient_id, visitDate.visit_id AS 'visit_id', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT concat_ws(' ', gettingProviderName.given_name, gettingProviderName.family_name) SEPARATOR ',') AS 'Provider', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT service.name SEPARATOR ',') AS 'Service', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT serviceType.name SEPARATOR ',') AS 'Service_Type', pi.identifier AS 'Identifier'
from patient pa INNER JOIN patient_appointment pai on pa.patient_id = pai.patient_id and pai.voided = 0 AND pai.status = 'CheckedIn' LEFT JOIN appointment_service service on pai.appointment_service_id = service.appointment_service_id and service.voided = 0 LEFT JOIN appointment_service_type serviceType ON service.appointment_service_id = serviceType.appointment_service_id AND pai.appointment_service_type_id = serviceType.appointment_service_type_id AND serviceType.voided = 0 LEFT JOIN visit visitDate ON pa.patient_id = visitDate.patient_id AND visitDate.voided = 0 AND visitDate.date_stopped is NULL JOIN patient_identifier pi ON pa.patient_id = pi.patient_id JOIN patient_identifier_type pit ON pi.identifier_type = pit.patient_identifier_type_id JOIN global_property gp ON gp.property='bahmni.primaryIdentifierType' AND gp.property_value=pit.uuid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT providerForAppointment.person_id, providerForAppointment.provider_id, nameOfTheProviders.given_name, nameOfTheProviders.family_name From provider providerForAppointment LEFT JOIN person_name nameOfTheProviders ON providerForAppointment.person_id = nameOfTheProviders.person_id ) AS gettingProviderName ON gettingProviderName.provider_id = pai.provider_id GROUP BY pi.identifier ORDER BY visitDate.date_started ) AS result ON result.patient_id = v.patient_id AND result.visit_id = v.visit_id WHERE v.date_stopped IS NULL AND v.voided = 0 ORDER BY v.date_started DESC;" where property= 'emrapi.sqlSearch.filingRoom';
